duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all operational needs of the school, including facility, financial operations, and human resource functions.
Ensure school-wide compliance with health and safety laws, charter contracts, and state education mandates.
Direct and oversee relationships with external financial service providers for accuracy and completeness in accounting.
Assist with the procurement, management, and coordination of school vendors.
Track enrollment at the school site and lead the enrollment process to meet targets.
Complete and file all local, state, and federal reports accurately and timely.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; advanced degree preferred in School Operations or related field
